original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽21.37. Hetuduka, Sanidassanattika🔽Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.🔽Nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  hetu duka sani dassana ttika  na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka  na na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka
translated: The Dhamma Paccanīyas in Direct and Reverse order, the Triads in Direct order, the Triads in Reverse order, the Pairs in Direct order, the Pairs in Reverse order, the Assigner of Roots, the Assigner of Manifestations🔽With root-cause, with manifestation, with impingement, not with root-cause, not with manifestation, not with impingement.🔽With root-cause, with manifestation, with impingement, not with root-cause, not with manifestation, with impingement.🔽With root-cause, with object, with predominance, with proximity, with contiguity, with immediate proximity, with kamma, with ripening, with nutriment, with faculty, with jhāna, with path, with association, with presence, with non-disappearance.🔽With root-cause, with object, with predominance, with proximity, with contiguity, with immediate proximity, with kamma, with ripening, with nutriment, with faculty, with jhāna, with path, with association, with presence, with non-disappearance, with disappearance.

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽(Nahetunaanidassanasappaṭighamūlepi tīṇiyeva.)🔽Nahetuṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na hetunā anidassana sa paṭigha mūle pi  na hetum na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With root-cause, with object, with predominance, with proximity, with contiguity, with immediate proximity, with kamma, with ripening, with nutriment, with faculty, with jhāna, with path, with association, with presence, with non-disappearance, with disappearance, with arising, with presence, with non-disappearance, with disappearance, with the past, with the future, with the present, with the past and future, with the past and present, with the future and present, with the past, future and present.

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
translated: With root-cause, with object, with predominance, with proximity, with contiguity, with immediate proximity, with kamma, with ripening, with nutriment, with faculty, with jhāna, with path, with association, with presence, with non-disappearance, with disappearance, with arising, with presence, with non-disappearance, with disappearance, with the past, with the future, with the present, with the past and future, with the past and present, with the future and present, with the past, future and present, with the internal, with the external, with the internal and external.🔽With root-cause, with object, with predominance, with proximity, with contiguity, with immediate proximity, with kamma, with ripening, with nutriment, with faculty,
